mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rogers, William, 1751-1824
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Solicits money for Baptist Indian mission at Serampore [East-Indies]. [Written on printed circular, with printed signatures of 26 ministers of Philidelphia, dated Feb. 4, 1806, soliciting money for printing the Scriptures in the seven languages of India.]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1806 February 24, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania] to Thomas Jefferson, Washington [D.C.].
